name: Pantos Story
summary: The frog Pantos lives a quiet, peaceful life in the land of Vita Lakamaya. One day he receives a message that his friend Garcia has left for the Sea of Oblivion, and so he makes the decision to follow him there. Pantos brings nothing but his musical horn with him on his journey, ready to play music with anyone else he meets. This adventure game has a slow, chill pace, encouraging players to immerse themselves in its narrative.
